@1nter1908 there are 6 russan files u have to delete  in win_32 folder

Also do this if u havent done that

click start on windows desktop , type RUN in the search file then type regedit press enter , then look for HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/SOFTWARE/wow6432node/Ubisoft/Farcry3
Then
you will see language russian change it to English and you will see sku rus change it for EN

@1nter1908:

In total. it is six .dat and .fat files that you have to remove. 

1. sound_russian.dat and sound_russian.fat in the Far Cry 3/data_win32 folder.

2. fc3_main_russian.dat and fc3_main_russian.fat in the Far Cry 3/data_win32/worlds/fc3_main folder and.

3 the multicommon_russian.dat and multicommon_russian.fat files in the Far Cry 3/data_win32/worlds/multicommon folder.

Here how to get everything working (at least for me)
1. Copy downloaded files to Far Cry 3 Directory
2. Delete all the files that have Russian in there names.
3.Open run then type "regedit", once there go to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE > SOFTWARE > Wow6432Node > Ubisaoft > Far Cry 3.
4. Change Language to English and SKU to ENG.
5. Safe Changes and start game.
6. Make sure in game options are all set to English, Should work fine now.
P.S. I started a new game to get the full experience so idk if it will crash when loading an old save, I wouldn't imageine it would, but you never know.

I'm sad to hear about those who get random crashes, yet so you know I am running the game on medium dx9(win7 64bit, laptop). So you might look into the idea that the graphics option might hold you back. Hope this helps!

P.S. How easy is it to get side tracked in this game!? I'm not usually an achievement whore but I've spent more than half of the time doing side missions since I've started playing.. Love this fricking game! :D
